title: ERC-20 token
description: ERC-20 tokens are blockchain-based assets, issued on the Ethereum network, that have value and can be sent and received. These tokens are fungible, meaning they can be exchanged with another token of the same type because they have identical properties and there is an equal value. For example, the ERC-20 token of Alice is exactly the same as the ERC-20 token of Bob. They can exchange their token without consequences.
